name: Pocket Rocket (Midgetwarrior)
description: In this game you fly through the galaxy trying to avoid obstacles. I don't know if the game works for mac or linux but it works 100% on windows please tell me if it works for mac or linux. The game is in beta and I plan on updating it the shop currently don't work so don't try it. Make sure to come back every week or 2 to see if the game has been updated.
